no.profile.noProfileDescription: Det ser ut til at du ikke har en profil ennå. Opprett en for å komme i gang!

ko.profile.noProfileDescription: 아직 프로필이 없는 것 같습니다. 시작하려면 프로필을 만드세요!

hi.profile.noProfileDescription: ऐसा लगता है कि आपके पास अभी तक कोई प्रोफ़ाइल नहीं है। शुरू करने के लिए एक बनाएं!

bn.profile.noProfileDescription: মনে হচ্ছে আপনার এখনো কোনো প্রোফাইল নেই। শুরু করতে একটি তৈরি করুন!

ta.profile.noProfileDescription: உங்களுக்கு இன்னும் சுயவிவரம் இல்லை என்று தெரிகிறது. தொடங்க ஒரு சுயவிவரத்தை உருவாக்கவும்!

te.profile.noProfileDescription: మీకు ఇంకా ప్రొఫైల్ లేనట్లుంది. ప్రారంభించడానికి ఒకదాన్ని సృష్టించండి!

mr.profile.noProfileDescription: तुमचे अजून प्रोफाइल दिसत नाही. सुरू करण्यासाठी एक तयार करा!

gu.profile.noProfileDescription: એવું લાગે છે કે તમારી પાસે હજી સુધી કોઈ પ્રોફાઇલ નથી. શરૂ કરવા માટે એક બનાવો!

ar.profile.noProfileTitle: لم يتم العثور على ملف شخصي
ar.profile.noProfileDescription: يبدو أنك لا تملك ملفًا شخصيًا بعد. أنشئ واحدًا للبدء!

he.profile.yourAvatarUrl: כתובת אתר של תמונת האווטאר שלך
he.profile.noProfileDescription: נראה שאין לך עדיין פרופיל. צור אחד כדי להתחיל!

fa.profile.noProfileDescription: به نظر می‌رسد هنوز پروفایلی ندارید. برای شروع یکی ایجاد کنید!

tr.profile.noProfileDescription: Görünüşe göre henüz bir profiliniz yok. Başlamak için bir tane oluşturun!

about.missionText: We strive to be the most trusted source for sports analysis and analysis. Our commitment to journalistic integrity means we deliver factual, unbiased coverage you can rely on.
about.footballCoverage: Football - Leagues, tournaments, and international competitions
about.basketballCoverage: Basketball - NBA, college basketball, and international leagues
about.valuesText: Integrity, accuracy, and passion drive everything we do. We believe in celebrating athletic achievements while maintaining the highest standards of sports journalism.
about.teamSubtitle: The passionate professionals behind The Sports Chronicle
about.team.editor.name: Vivaan Handa
about.team.editor.title: Research Head and Website Manager
about.team.editor.description: Leading our research initiatives and managing the digital platform with expertise in data analysis and web development.

about.team.analyst.description: Creating engaging content and showcasing sports techniques through detailed analysis and expert commentary.

about.team.reporter.description: Managing our social media presence and community engagement across all digital platforms.
about.team.photographer.name: Shaurya Gupta
about.team.photographer.title: Feedback and Data Analytics
about.team.photographer.description: Analyzing user feedback and performance metrics to continuously improve our platform and content quality.
